params.name: xmin
params.description: Lower x bound of the grid

params.name: xmax
params.description: Upper x bound

params.name: ymin
params.description: Lower y bound

params.name: ymax
params.description: Upper y bound

params.name: nx
params.description: Number of bins along x axis

params.name: ny
params.description: Number of bins along y axis

NaiveBroadphase.name: NaiveBroadphase
NaiveBroadphase.description: Naive broadphase implementation. Does N^2 tests.

Nearphase.name: Nearphase
Nearphase.description: Nearphase. Creates contacts and friction given shapes and transforms.

params.name: An
params.description:
object representing the bounds of the top level of the QuadTree. The object
should contain the following properties : x, y, width, height

params.name: pointQuad
params.description:
Whether the QuadTree will contain points (true), or items with bounds
(width / height)(false). Default value is false.

params.name: maxDepth
params.description: The maximum number of levels that the quadtree will create. Default is 4.

params.name: maxChildren
params.description: The maximum number of children that a node can contain before it is split into sub-nodes.

SAP1DBroadphase.name: SAP1DBroadphase
SAP1DBroadphase.description: Sweep and prune broadphase along one axis.

DistanceConstraint.name: DistanceConstraint
DistanceConstraint.description: Constraint that tries to keep the distance between two bodies constant.
DistanceConstraint.author: schteppe

params.name: dist
params.description: The distance to keep between the bodies.

params.name: bi
params.description: First body participating in the equation

params.name: bj
params.description: Second body participating in the equation

params.name: minForce
params.description: Minimum force to apply. Default: -1e6

params.name: maxForce
params.description: Maximum force to apply. Default: 1e6

FrictionEquation.name: FrictionEquation
FrictionEquation.description: Constrains the slipping in a contact along a tangent

PointToPointConstraint.name: PointToPointConstraint
PointToPointConstraint.description: Connects two bodies at given offset points
PointToPointConstraint.author: schteppe

params.name: pivotA
params.description: The point relative to the center of mass of bodyA which bodyA is constrained to.

params.name: bodyB
params.description: Body that will be constrained in a similar way to the same point as bodyA. We will therefore get sort of a link between bodyA and bodyB. If not specified, bodyA will be constrained to a static point.

params.name: pivotB
params.description: See pivotA.

params.name: maxForce
params.description: The maximum force that should be applied to constrain the bodies.

PrismaticConstraint.name: PrismaticConstraint
PrismaticConstraint.description: Constraint that only allows translation along a line between the bodies, no rotation
PrismaticConstraint.author: schteppe

RotationalVelocityEquation.name: RotationalVelocityEquation
RotationalVelocityEquation.description: Syncs rotational velocity of two bodies, or sets a relative velocity (motor).

params.name: string
params.description: name

mat2.name: mat2
mat2.description: The mat2 object from glMatrix, extended with the functions documented here. See http://glmatrix.net for full doc.

vec2.name: vec2
vec2.description: The vec2 object from glMatrix, extended with the functions documented here. See http://glmatrix.net for full doc.

Body.name: Body

props.name: shape
props.description: Used for collision detection. If absent the body will not collide.

props.name: mass
props.description: A number >= 0. If zero, the body becomes static. Defaults to static [0].

todo: Should not take mass as an argument to Body
but as density to each Shape

props.name: worldAnchorA
props.description: Where to hook the spring to body A, in world coordinates.

props.name: localAnchorA
props.description: Where to hook the spring to body A, in local body coordinates.

params.name: length
params.description: The distance between the end points

params.name: radius
params.description: Radius of the capsule

params.name: vertices
params.description: An array of Float32Array vertices that span this shape. Vertices are given in counter-clockwise (CCW) direction.

Plane.name: Plane
Plane.description: Plane shape class. The plane is facing in the Y direction.

Island.name: Island
Island.description: An island of bodies connected with equations.

IslandSolver.name: IslandSolver
IslandSolver.description: Splits the system of bodies and equations into independent islands

World.name: World
World.description: The dynamics world, where all bodies and constraints lives.

classitems.description: Get all potential intersecting body pairs.
classitems.name: getCollisionPairs

params.name: world
params.description: The world to search in.

return.description: An array of the bodies, ordered in pairs. Example: A result of [a,b,c,d] means that the potential pairs are: (a,b), (c,d).

params.description: If set, this value overrides the circle shape radius.

classitems.description: Circle/Particle nearphase

classitems.description: Creates ContactEquations and FrictionEquations for a collision.
classitems.name: circlePlane

params.name: bi
params.description: The first body that should be connected to the equations.

params.name: si
params.description: The circle shape participating in the collision.

params.name: xi
params.description: Extra offset to take into account for the Shape, in addition to the one in circleBody.position. Will *not* be rotated by circleBody.angle (maybe it should, for sake of homogenity?). Set to null if none.

params.name: bj
params.description: The second body that should be connected to the equations.

params.name: sj
params.description: The Plane shape that is participating

params.name: xj
params.description: Extra offset for the plane shape.

params.name: aj
params.description: Extra angle to apply to the plane

classitems.description: Find a separating axis between the shapes, that maximizes the separating distance between them.
classitems.name: findSeparatingAxis

params.name: sepAxis
params.description: The resulting axis

return.description: Whether the axis could be found.

classitems.description: Get the edge that has a normal closest to an axis.
classitems.name: getClosestEdge

return.description: Index of the edge that is closest. This index and the next spans the resulting edge. Returns -1 if failed.

classitems.description: The root node of the QuadTree which covers the entire area being segmented.
classitems.name: root

classitems.description: Inserts an item into the QuadTree.
classitems.name: insert

params.name: item
params.description:
The item or Array of items to be inserted into the QuadTree. The item should expose x, y
properties that represents its position in 2D space.

classitems.description: Clears all nodes and children from the QuadTree
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description:
Retrieves all items / points in the same node as the specified item / point. If the specified item
overlaps the bounds of a node, then all children in both nodes will be returned.
classitems.name: retrieve

params.name: item
params.description:
An object representing a 2D coordinate point (with x, y properties), or a shape
with dimensions (x, y, width, height) properties.

classitems.description: List of bodies currently in the broadphase.

classitems.description: The world to search in.
classitems.name: world

classitems.description: Axis to sort the bodies along. Set to 0 for x axis, and 1 for y axis. For best performance, choose an axis that the bodies are spread out more on.

classitems.description: Function for sorting bodies along the X axis. To be passed to array.sort()

classitems.description: The number of time steps needed to stabilize the constraint equation. Typically between 3 and 5 time steps.

classitems.description: Update SPOOK parameters .a, .b and .eps according to the given time step. See equations 9, 10 and 11 in the SPOOK notes.
